front.title: A Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Package and Data Format for Describing Files

abstract.t: This document specifies the format and semantics associated to a 'file' event package that allows SIP endpoints to publish the availability of files. A file can be, for example, images, video files, audio files, etc. File descriptors are provided in an eXtended Mark-up Language (XML) 'file-metadata' document. This event package also availability of files, or perform searches for the availability and location of a given file. Support for partial notifications and publications is also accomplished by using XML patch operations. allows SIP endpoints to subscribe to changes in the
